name: Firewood
description: A random assortment of wood, good for little else than as fuel for fires.

description: Scraps of wood left over from other woodworking.

description: An arrow fletching made from feathers.

description: Scraps of iron left over from other blacksmithing.

name: Scraps, lead
description: Scraps of lead left over from other blacksmithing.

name: Branch, common
description: The branch of a softwood tree, such as pine.

name: Canvas
description: A rough, sturdy fabric made from cotton.

name: Cloth
description: A smooth fabric made from cotton or wool.

description: Commonly available meats such as chicken and pork.

description: An ore of iron.

description: An ore of lead.

description: Scraps of tin left over from other blacksmithing.

description: Scraps of zinc left over from other blacksmithing.

name: Silk, raw
description: The raw threads produced by a silkworm.

name: Supplies
description: Commonly available supplies such as salt, pepper, vegetables, herbs, fruits, coal, cotton, wool, and pitch.

name: Thread
description: Thin string used for sewing.

description: Scraps of brass left over from other blacksmithing.

description: A metal belt buckle.

description: More expensive meats such as beef, duck, or lamb.

name: Scraps, leather
description: Bits of various leathers left over from other leatherworking

name: Scraps, silver
description: Scraps of silver left over from other blacksmithing.

name: Ingot, iron
description: A silvery metal that can be worked into tools or further refined into metals such as steel or dragonsteel.

name: Ingot, lead
description: A soft, dark-colored metal with a low melting point.

name: Scales
description: The scales of a reptilian creature.

name: Silk
description: A smooth, luxurious fabric made from the byproduct of a silkworm.

name: Ore, silver
description: An ore of silver.

name: Branch, quality
description: The branch from a tree of medium hardness, such as a fruit tree.

name: Hide
description: The hide of an animal, usually the hide of livestock like cattle or sheep.

name: Hide, raw
description: The hide of an animal that has been scraped and treated with lye in preparation for tanning.

name: Ingot, copper
description: An orange metal with a high conductance.

name: Ingot, tin
description: A soft, silvery metal useful in alloys.

name: Ingot, zinc
description: A light, blue-ish white metal used in alloys.

name: Parts, common
description: Easily crafted, simple mechanical parts.

name: Scraps, gold
description: Scraps of gold left over from other blacksmithing.

name: Ingot, brass
description: A golden alloy derived from copper and zinc that is resistant to corrosion.

name: Ingot, bronze
description: A brown alloy derived from copper and tin used for weaponry and armor.

name: Leather, tanned
description: The hide of an animal that has been tanned, increasing its strength.

name: Carapace, medium
description: The carapace of an insectoid creature.

name: Leather, hardened
description: Leather that has been hardened, further increasing its strength and rigidity.

name: Armor Padding
description: The padding used in armor, often made from wool.

name: Ingot, steel
description: A processed form of iron that is more sturdy and resistant to corrosion.

name: Ore, gold
description: An ore of gold.

name: Scraps, electrum
description: Scraps of electrum left over from other blacksmithing.

name: Scraps, platinum
description: Scraps of platinum left over from other blacksmithing.

name: Special Ingredients
description: Special cooking supplies such as most meats, spices, oils, and rare seeds.

name: Luxury Ingredients
description: Hard to obtain luxury goods such as caviar, saffron, and veal.

name: Ore, platinum
description: An ore of platinum.

name: Parts, fancy
description: Complicated mechanical parts such as cogs, springs, or switches.

name: Ingot, silver
description: A shiny metal used in jewelery.

description: Ink made of magical components.

description: A reagent with curative properties.

name: Reagent, common (poisonous)
description: A reagent with poisonous properties.

name: Reagent, common (reactive)
description: A reagent with reactive properties.

name: Branch, uncommon
description: The branch of a hardwood tree, such as oak.

name: Carapace, large
description: The carapace of an insectoid creature.

description: Ink made of powerful magical components.

name: Parchment, uncommon
description: Parchment enchanted by magical components.

description: A magical reagent with curative properties.

name: Reagent, uncommon (poisonous)
description: A magical reagent with poisonous properties.

name: Reagent, uncommon (reactive)
description: A magical reagent with reactive properties.

description: Magical essence from an aberration, construct, dragon, or giant, or ooze.

name: Essence, common (occult)
description: Magical essence from a fiend or undead.

name: Essence, common (primal)
description: Magical essence from a construct, dragon, elemental, giant, ooze, or plant.

description: Magical essence from an aberration or fey.

description: A yellow, shiny metal prized for use in jewelery.

description: A yellow alloy of gold and silver with an extremely high conductance.

description: A rare, silvery metal used in jewelery.
